snippet: In the months since several players were linked to a Florida anti-aging clinic, Major League Baseball and Alex Rodriguez have engaged in a cloak-and-dagger struggle surpassing anything the sport has seen.
abstract: Alex Rodriguez and Major League Baseball have engaged in unprecedented cloak-and-dagger struggle in nine months since New York Yankees slugger was among several players linked to doping at Florida anti-aging clinic; those involved say both sides have employed dubious investigative tactics, harassment and threats, highlighting league's resolve to prove that Rodriguez cheated and his determination to discredit baseball officials.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER, SERGE F. KOVALESKI and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT
byline.contributor: Elena Gustines contributed reporting and Alain Delaquérière contributed research.

lead_paragraph: In the months since several players were linked to a Florida anti-aging clinic, Major League Baseball and Alex Rodriguez have engaged in a cloak-and-dagger struggle surpassing anything the sport has seen.

headline.main: In Rodriguez Arbitration, Two Sides Play Hardball
